summary:
A Camera Mod Winch Restores The Camera To The Way It Was In Elder Scrolls IV(4) Oblivion.
And yes the mod name is VI not IV :)
descriptionHtml:
This Is A Camera Mod And Will Restore The Camera To The Way It Was In Elder Scrolls Oblivion.
I Have Included The Tutorial In The Images.
Its Not Hard So Dont Worry.
I Will Add Brighter Images If Their Really Needed And Requested.
Please Comment I Usually Have A Good Laugh Reading Theme As For My Files And Mods Always...
Suck Big Time.
Is Said That I Cant Stop Using Smilies.
Thats True.
This Time I Havent Used Any.
So Its Not Ture.
Paradox? :D :D :D :D :D :D: D: D: D: D: D: D :DD:D:D:D
Also,Please Back Up All The Things That You Change In The Process I Take No Responsibilty For What Might Happen.
Ive Used Too Many Dots Nexus Doesnt Let Me Use Anymore|
LOL
By The Way - I TALK TOO MUCH|
author: U Dont Need To Know Trust Me
